meanings.definition: Refer to something briefly or casually.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, she will mention the new project.
meanings.sent2: Please mention your dietary restrictions when ordering.
meanings.sent3: I can't help but mention the delicious smell coming from the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The book subtly mentions the protagonist's hidden past.
meanings.sent5: He always makes sure to mention his favorite book in every conversation.

meanings.definition: Bring up or introduce something in conversation.
meanings.sent1: She will mention her travel plans during dinner.
meanings.sent2: If you have any concerns, feel free to mention them.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't help but mention the funny joke I heard earlier.
meanings.sent4: The speaker mentioned a bright future ahead for the company.
meanings.sent5: His eyes lit up when he mentioned his dream vacation destination.
